definitions: a supporter of a policy of revision or modification

examples.text: the revisionists who sought to replace it were long denied

shortDefinitions: supporter of policy of revision or modification

definitions: a person with a revised attitude to a previously accepted situation or point of view

examples.text: revisionists have argued that the battle was crucial

shortDefinitions: person with revised attitude to previously accepted situation or point of view

definitions: advocating a policy of revision or modification
shortDefinitions: advocating policy of revision or modification

definitions: promoting a revised attitude to a previously accepted situation or point of view

examples.text: he is unimpressed by the arguments of revisionist historians
a revisionist view of the media's role in politics

shortDefinitions: promoting revised attitude to previously accepted situation or point of view
